channel.title: Client doesnt Default to run after logging in?
channel.description:
Hey guys, i would like to fix a problem regarding running in my server.
I want to set it so that new players automaticly have run enabled when they join. Also if i were to enable run, log out, and log in, its set to walk again?

item.title: Client doesnt Default to run after logging in?
item.dc:creator: @Kieron532 Kieron532
item.description:
@Kieron532 wrote:

Well i want new players to automaticly have RUN enabled.
And for some reason if i have run enabled and log out and log back in, it goes back to walk mode, i want to change this so it still stays on run

My serv is 317 btw

Read full topic
item.source: Client doesnt Default to run after logging in?

item.title: Client doesnt Default to run after logging in?
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

So you only want new players to have run automatically on, and all other player will have run automatically off when they log in?

Read full topic
